Anonymous creator Oreghall shares how writing down every decision fosters greater conscientiousness. He notes two effects:Â “It gives you a tool to cut through indecisiveness,”Â andÂ “It eliminates impulsivity by forcing you to reflect and consider every decision. About to check your phone? Oh yeah, I have to write a decision down. On second thought, I’m supposed to be finishing this other task, so it can wait.”
